article_text:
Adele Cervantez and Brad Adolfson, together with their families, are pleased to announce their engagement.

The bride-to-be is the daughter of Linda and Frank Cervantez of Broomfield. She is a 1987 graduate of Broomfield High School and a graduate of Idaho State University. She is currently a manager at Hewlett-Packard in Boise, Idaho.

The future groom is the son of Debra and Terry Adolfson of Nampa, Idaho. He is a 1994 graduate of Hood River High School in Oregon and a graduate of Western Oregon University. He is currently a teacher and head basketball coach at Weiser High School in Weiser, Idaho.

A March wedding is planned.
